name: Girl Genius!
description:
The Genius Girl is carrying out a task, help her get rid of the tails after first. Good job, it seems you are very smart and have much potential. Boost your brainpower to help the girl solve different cases! You are the Genius!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Think boldly, only genius guys could make it
* No time limited, try your solutions patiently
